Title: Tales of Manhattan
Writer: Ben Hecht (original story and screenplay), Ferenc Molnár (original story and screenplay), Donald Ogden Stewart (original story and screenplay), Samuel Hoffenstein (original story and screenplay), Alan Campbell (original story and screenplay), Ladislas Fodor (original story and screenplay), László Vadnay (original story and screenplay), László Görög (original story and screenplay), Lamar Trotti (original story and screenplay), Henry Blankfort (original story and screenplay)
Actors: Charles Boyer, Rita Hayworth, Ginger Rogers, Henry Fonda
Plot: An actor, Paul Orman, is accidentally told that his new, custom made tail coat has been cursed and it will bring misfortune to all who wear it. As the 4 succeeding wearers of the coat discover, misfortune can often lead to truth.
